name: Super Ninja P.I.
description:
Super Ninja P.I. was created for KrassJam 12 in 72 hours.

Credits:
Krassenstein - Game Design, Programming, SFX
Artstoff - Art, Game Design

How to Play:
Growing up in an older civilization of ninjas, you've decided to move to the big city and open a private investigator firm to live a life of excitement. Your first task is to uncover some shady business practices at MegaCom. Find all four pieces of evidence and get out without being noticed.

Controls:
Move - WASD / Left Stick
Jump - Space / A
Run - Shift / B
Attack - Left Click / X
Interact - E / Y
Pause - Escape / Start
